text: Lowe's is an American retail company. It specializes in home improvement. It is headquartered in Mooresville, North Carolina. It operates a chain of retail stores in the United States. It has 2,181 home improvement and hardware stores in North America. It was founded in 1921. Category:1921 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in North Carolina Category:Companies based in North Carolina Category:Hardware stores of Canada Category:Retail companies of the United States
title: Lowe's
